name: Convert Google Sheets text cells to audio files with Google Text-to-Speech
description: Every time a new row is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create an audio file from the selected cell text. The template uses [this example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/19wCGzswLETfE0YP3Ju5PgijXAmtVcQr09dN36lSO1Lk/edit?usp=sharing).
